type-of-projects.name: FullStack development
type-of-projects.description: Most of my project are oriented about Fullstack world. I love building restful APIs and dynamic frontend. My favorite languages are Java and Javascript. That's why you will a lot of projects using Spring boot for the backend and node frameworks for the frontend ! However I really enjoy discovering new languages, so I am sure that you can find your favorite language among them !

type-of-projects.name: Automation and deployment
type-of-projects.description: Then you can find projects adding github worflows. CI/CD pipelines are neccessary for DevOps today, I am trying my best to integrate them in my code. Every recent projects use docker (ready to deploy !) .

type-of-projects.name: AI
type-of-projects.description: Finally you can also find little ai projects. It's not my favorite part of coding, but the results are amazing and its integration in code can add some importante features in an app !

about.title: À propos de moi
about.description: Je suis ingénieur en dernière année, spécialisé dans le cloud, le développement web, l’IA et l’architecture logicielle. Passionné par les technologies modernes, j’aime construire des projets concrets permettant d’apprendre rapidement.
